instruction.value: Administer by continuous infusion.
DAY 1. Administer 1000 mL over 2 hours. "posthydration".
DAY 8. Administer 1000 mL over 2 hours. "posthydration".
DAY 1 of 21. Administer 1000 mL over 2 hours. "posthydration".
DAY 1 of 21. Administer 1000 mL over 2 hours.
DAY 1 of 21. Administer 1000 mL over 2 hours (posthydration).
DAY 1 of 21. Administer 1000 mL over 2 hours. "prehydration".
DAY 1 of 28. Administer 1000 mL over 2 hours. "prehydration".
DAY 8 of 28. Administer 1000 mL over 2 hours. "prehydration".
Bolus dose.
DAYS 1, 2 & 3 of 21. Administer 250 mL over 30 minutes prior to each CISplatin dose. (Prehydration)
DAY 1. Administer 100 mL concurrently with vinorelbine, then remaining 400 mL over 30 minutes, immediately post-vinorelbine. "prehydration"
DAY 8. Administer 100 mL concurrently with vinorelbine, then remaining 400 mL over 30 minutes, immediately post-vinorelbine. "prehydration"
DAY 15. Administer 100 mL concurrently with vinorelbine, then remaining 400 mL over 30 minutes, immediately post-vinorelbine.
DAY 22. Administer 100 mL concurrently with vinorelbine, then remaining 400 mL over 30 minutes, immediately post-vinorelbine.
DAY 1 of 21. Administer 100 mL concurrently with vinorelbine, then remaining 400 mL over 30 minutes, immediately post-vinorelbine. "prehydration"
DAY 8 of 21. Administer 100 mL concurrently with vinorelbine, then remaining 400 mL over 30 minutes, immediately post-vinorelbine.
DAY 1 of 21. Administer over 1 hour. "Posthydration".
DAY 1 of 21. Administer 100 mL concurrently with vinorelbine, then remaining 400 mL over 30 minutes, immediately post-vinorelbine.
DAY 1 of 21. Administer 250 to 500 mL concurrently with gemcitabine.
DAY 8 of 21. Administer 250 to 500 mL concurrently with gemcitabine.
DAY 1 of 21. Administer over 1 hour (re-hydration).
DAY 8 of 21. Administer concurrently with gemcitabine infusion.
DAY 1 of 21. Administer concurrently with gemcitabine infusion.
DAY 1 of 21. Administer over 1 hour. (Prehydration)
DAY 1 of 21. Administer over 1 hour. (Posthydration)
DAY 8 of 28. Administer over 1 hour. (Posthydration)
DAY 1 of 21. Administer over 1 hour after CISplatin. (Post-hydration)
DAY 1 of 21. Administer over 1 hour after CISplatin. (Post hydration)

additionalnotes.value: Alternatives may include magnesium sulfat 4000 mg additive or potassium chloride 20 mmol.
Alternatives may include magnesium sulfate 4000 mg additive and/or potassium chloride 20 mmol.
Actual rate and volume will be variable and based upon nursing assessment of discomfort at injection site.
